member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.SignaturePadCanvas
member.summary: Gets the underlying control that handles the signatures.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.SignatureLine
member.summary: Gets the horizontal line that goes in the lower part of the pad.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.CaptionLabel
member.summary: The caption displayed under the signature line.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.SignaturePrompt
member.summary: The prompt displayed at the beginning of the signature line.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.ClearLabel
member.summary: Gets the label that clears the pad when clicked.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.BackgroundImageView
member.summary: Gets the image view that handles the background image.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.StrokeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the signature strokes.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.StrokeWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the signature strokes.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.SignatureLineColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the signature line.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.SignatureLineWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the signature line.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.SignatureLineSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the spacing between the signature line and the caption.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.CaptionText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text for the caption displayed under the signature line.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.CaptionFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of the caption.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.CaptionTextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the caption text.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.PromptText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text for the prompt displayed at the beginning of the signature line.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.PromptFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of the prompt displayed at the beginning of the signature line.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.PromptTextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the text color of the prompt displayed at the beginning of the signature line.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.ClearText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text for the label that clears the pad when clicked.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.ClearFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of the label that clears the pad when clicked.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.ClearTextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the label that clears the pad when clicked.

member.summary: Gets or sets the watermark image.

member.summary: Gets or sets the aspect for the watermark image.

member.name: P:SignaturePad.Forms.SignaturePadView.BackgroundImageOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the transparency of the watermark.
